content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory exists yet.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure the connection points of the entities are not occupied by other entities.
- Verify that the fluid system of the offshore pump and the boiler are the same before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
- Make sure the tile is not occupied by another entity.

### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have enough fuel before attempting to use them.
- Make sure the fuel source is not empty.

### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler are connected to the same fluid system before attempting to use them.
- Make sure the offshore pump and boiler have enough fluid to operate.
